001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.training.optimizers;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.ActivationsCachedNeuron;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetwork;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuronVisitor;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.LearningRateConfigurable;
012
013import java.util.HashMap;
014import java.util.IdentityHashMap;
015import java.util.Map;
016
017/**
018 * Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) optimizer with per-sample backpropagation and
019 * batch accumulation of gradients.
020 * <p>
021 * This implementation:
022 * <ul>
023 *   <li>Performs a forward pass for each sample, computes error signals (δ), and
024 *       accumulates weight/bias gradients over the given {@link DataSet}.</li>
025 *   <li>Applies a single parameter update after processing the full set (i.e., a mini-batch/batch step).</li>
026 *   <li>Relies on {@link ActivationsCachedNeuron} to access cached forward-pass values needed for backprop.</li>
027 *   <li>Deactivates neuron activation caches after parameters are updated.</li>
028 * </ul>
029 *
030 * <p><strong>Batch scaling convention:</strong> This class, as written, assumes the provided
031 * {@link ObjectiveFunction#calculateGradient_dJ_da(int, Float[], Float[])} returns
032 * gradients already scaled by the batch size (i.e., mean over the batch). Consequently,
033 * parameter updates do not divide by the batch size again on apply.</p>
034 *
035 * @param <N> a {@link NeuralNetwork} type optimized by this optimizer
036 */
037@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
038public class StochasticGradientDescent<N extends NeuralNetwork> implements Optimizer<N, Float>, LearningRateConfigurable {
039
040    /**
041     * Default learning rate used when none is set explicitly.
042     */
043    public static final float DEFAULT_LEARNING_RATE = 0.1f;
044
045    private final Map<String, Object> hyperparameters = new HashMap<>() {{
046        put(HP_LEARNING_RATE, DEFAULT_LEARNING_RATE);
047    }};
048
049    /**
050     * Runs one optimization step over the provided training set.
051     * <p>
052     * For each sample, this method:
053     * <ol>
054     *   <li>Performs a forward pass to get network outputs.</li>
055     *   <li>Computes the loss gradient w.r.t. activations from the {@link ObjectiveFunction}.</li>
056     *   <li>Backpropagates error signals (δ) layer-by-layer to accumulate gradients for all weights and biases.</li>
057     * </ol>
058     * After all samples are processed, it applies the accumulated gradients to the network parameters
059     * using the configured learning rate, and deactivates activation caches.
060     *
061     * <p><strong>Note:</strong> This implementation assumes {@code objective.calculateGradient_dJ_da}
062     * returns gradients that are already averaged over the batch size passed in. Therefore the
063     * final parameter updates do not perform an additional division by the batch size.</p>
064     *
065     * @param neuralNetwork the network to optimize
066     * @param trainingSet   the data used for one optimization step (treated here as a batch)
067     * @param objective     the objective/loss function providing gradients w.r.t. output activations
068     */
069    @Override
070    public void optimize(N neuralNetwork, DataSet<Float> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective) {
071        int batchSize = trainingSet.size();
072        if (batchSize == 0) {
073            return;
074        }
075
076        // Collect and add all the weighted votes for parameter (bias + weights) corrections
077        Map<Neuron, float[]> accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections = new IdentityHashMap<>();
078
079        // For each sample n, compute error signal δ - delta - layer-by-layer (backward), accumulate gradients
080        trainingSet.forEach(s -> voteForParameterCorrections(s, batchSize, accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections, neuralNetwork, objective));
081
082        // Apply changes
083        neuralNetwork.accept(new NeuronVisitor() {
084            @Override
085            public void visitNeuron(NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork, Neuron neuron, int layerIndex, int neuronIndex) {
086                float[] parameterCorrections = accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections.get(neuron);
087                if (parameterCorrections != null) {
088                    for (int p = 0; p < parameterCorrections.length; p++) {
089                        neuron.adjustParameter(p, getLearningRate() * -1 * parameterCorrections[p]);
090                    }
091                }
092            }
093        });
094    }
095
096    private void voteForParameterCorrections(DataSet.Sample<Float> sample, int batchSize, Map<Neuron, float[]> accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections, N neuralNetwork, ObjectiveFunction objective) {
097        Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals = new IdentityHashMap<>();
098        Float[] estimated = neuralNetwork.estimate(sample.features());
099        Float[] lossGradients = objective.calculateGradient_dJ_da(1, estimated, sample.targetOutputs());
100        for (int j = 0; j < neuralNetwork.coArity(); j++) {
101            voteForOutputNodeParameterCorrections(batchSize, accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections, neuralNetwork, lossGradients, errorSignals, j);
102        }
103        for (int l = neuralNetwork.getDepth() - 1; l >= 1; l--) {
104            int width = neuralNetwork.getWidth(l);
105            for (int j = 0; j < width; j++) {
106                voteForHiddenNodeParameterCorrections(batchSize, accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections, neuralNetwork, errorSignals, l, j);
107            }
108        }
109    }
110
111    private void voteForOutputNodeParameterCorrections(int batchSize, Map<Neuron, float[]> accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections, N neuralNetwork, Float[] lossGradients, Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals, int j) {
112        ActivationsCachedNeuron outputNode = neuralNetwork.getNeuron(neuralNetwork.getDepth(), j, ActivationsCachedNeuron.class);
113        ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation activation = outputNode.getCache().removeLast();
114
115        // determine error signal for output node
116        float errorSignal = lossGradients[j] * outputNode.getNeuronFunction().getActivationFunction().determineGradientForOutput(activation.output());
117        errorSignals.put(outputNode, errorSignal); // track error signal for upstream nodes
118
119        // cast vote
120        voteForNodeParameterCorrections(batchSize, accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections, errorSignal, outputNode, activation);
121    }
122
123    private void voteForHiddenNodeParameterCorrections(int batchSize, Map<Neuron, float[]> accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections, N neuralNetwork, Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals, int l, int j) {
124        ActivationsCachedNeuron hiddenNode = neuralNetwork.getNeuron(l, j, ActivationsCachedNeuron.class);
125        ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation activation = hiddenNode.getCache().removeLast();
126
127        // determine error signal for hidden node using back propagation
128        float backPropagation = calculateBackPropagation(neuralNetwork, errorSignals, l, j);
129        float errorSignal = backPropagation * hiddenNode.getNeuronFunction().getActivationFunction().determineGradientForOutput(activation.output());
130        errorSignals.put(hiddenNode, errorSignal);
131
132        // cast vote
133        voteForNodeParameterCorrections(batchSize, accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections, errorSignal, hiddenNode, activation);
134    }
135
136    private static <N extends NeuralNetwork> float calculateBackPropagation(N neuralNetwork, Map<Neuron, Float> errorSignals, int l, int j) {
137        float backPropagation = 0.0f;
138        Map<Neuron, Float> downstreamNodes = neuralNetwork.getOutputConnections(l, j);
139        for (Map.Entry<Neuron, Float> e : downstreamNodes.entrySet()) {
140            float downstreamWeight = e.getValue();
141            float downstreamErrorSignal = errorSignals.getOrDefault(e.getKey(), 0.0f);
142            backPropagation += downstreamErrorSignal * downstreamWeight;
143        }
144        return backPropagation;
145    }
146
147    private void voteForNodeParameterCorrections(int batchSize, Map<Neuron, float[]> accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections, float errorSignal, ActivationsCachedNeuron neuron, ActivationsCachedNeuron.Activation activation) {
148        Float[] parameterGradients_df_dp = activation.parameterGradients_df_dp();
149        int parameterCount = neuron.getParameterCount();
150        float[] votesForNeuron = accumulatedWeightedVotesForParameterCorrections.computeIfAbsent(neuron, k -> new float[parameterCount]);
151        for (int p = 0; p < parameterCount; p++) {
152            float parameterCorrection = errorSignal * parameterGradients_df_dp[p];
153            float weightedVote = parameterCorrection / batchSize;
154            votesForNeuron[p] += weightedVote;
155        }
156    }
157
158    /**
159     * {@inheritDoc
160     */
161    @Override
162    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
163        return hyperparameters;
164    }
165
166    /**
167     * {@inheritDoc
168     */
169    @Override
170    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
171        hyperparameters.put(name, value);
172    }
173}
